result.name: southern-north-sea-and-english-channel-plankton-survey-rv-cirolana-01-87
result.notes:
This survey was carried out in January 1987 as part of the International 
Council for the Exploration of the Sea (ICES) co-ordinated herring larval 
survey of regions IVc and VIId (southern North Sea and eastern English 
Channel). Plankton samples were collected at each site on a planned survey 
grid. Clupeid larvae were identified and enumerated. Associated positional 
data and volumes filtered also included.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Southern North Sea And English Channel Plankton Survey - RV Cirolana 01/87

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
